snippet.title: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 2 - Get Tannen - Trailer
snippet.description:
ESRB Rating: TEEN with Drug and Alcohol Reference, Language, Mild Blood, Mild Violence, Sexual Themes

The full season is available now on PSN, PC/Mac, and iOS!

PSN: http://bit.ly/Z2PNzb
PC/Mac: http://bit.ly/fLYGVS
iOS: http://bit.ly/XGNWUh

In this episode "Get Tannen!", Marty is keeping an eye on young Doc Brown's proverbial date with scientific destiny when he and 1980s Doc must prevent gang boss Kid Tannen from wreaking havoc on Marty's family and erasing his girlfriend from the future!

* Featuring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd likenesses, with Christopher Lloyd returning to voice Doc.
* Back to the Future's 'first families'. The McFlys, Browns, and of course, the Tannens -- all play key roles.
* Collaboration with Trilogy Co-Creator/Writer Bob Gale to help in shaping the storyline.

Website: http://www.telltalegames.com/bttf
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/telltalegames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/telltalegames
